name: Brill.js
tagline: Brill.js is a library that works with the DOM and server. It also comes with Brill.css and themes.css.
body: Brill.js ======== Brill.js is a library that works with the DOM and server. It also comes with Brill.css and themes.css. How to use it ============ To start using it, make a variable called app (or whatever you want). Inside app, write this: new Brill([]); You can put anything you want in that array. It will just get returned. In v1, there is a number of functions. To use the map function, simply write app.map(callback); You really should look in the library. If you have any ideas or improvements, please comment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
